title: Career Aspirations
question_text: Describe your ideal career path and what motivates you to pursue it.
question_text_ar: صف مسارك المهني المثالي وما الذي يحفزك لمتابعته.

title: Biggest Achievement
question_text: Tell us about your most significant professional or academic achievement and what you learned from it.
question_text_ar: أخبرنا عن أهم إنجاز مهني أو أكاديمي لديك وما تعلمته منه.

title: Problem Solving Experience
question_text: Describe a challenging problem you solved and the approach you took.
question_text_ar: صف مشكلة صعبة قمت بحلها والنهج الذي اتبعته.

title: Work Values
question_text: What are the most important values you look for in a workplace? Explain why.
question_text_ar: ما هي أهم القيم التي تبحث عنها في مكان العمل؟ اشرح السبب.

title: Learning Experience
question_text: Share an experience where you had to learn something completely new. How did you approach it?
question_text_ar: شارك تجربة كان عليك فيها تعلم شيء جديد تماماً. كيف تعاملت معها؟
